workerManagerResourceSpotAllocation

Class WorkerManagerResourceSpotAllocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • workerManagerResourceSpotAllocation.WorkerManagerResourceSpotAllocation

  • public class WorkerManagerResourceSpotAllocation
extends java.lang.Object
    WorkerManagerResourceSpotAllocation.java --- The main Class managing the different ResourceManagers, mainly the one for minerals and the one for gas.
    Author:
    P H - 03.09.2017

    • Method Detail

      • canAddMineralGatherer

        public boolean canAddMineralGatherer()
        Function for testing if a worker can be added towards the MineralPatchManager.
        Returns:
        true if a worker can be added towards the MineralPatchManager, false if not / no space is available.

      • addMineralGatherer

        public boolean addMineralGatherer(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for adding a worker to the MineralPatchManager.
        Parameters:
        entry - the worker that is going to be added towards the MineralPatchManager.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was successfully added towards the manager, false if not or no space was available.

      • canAddGasGatherer

        public boolean canAddGasGatherer()
        Function for testing if a worker can be added towards the RefineryManager
        Returns:
        true if a worker can be added towards the RefineryManager, false if not / no space is available.

      • addGasGatherer

        public boolean addGasGatherer(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for adding a worker to the RefineryManager.
        Parameters:
        entry - the worker that is going to be added towards the RefineryManager.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was successfully added towards the manager, false if not or no space was available.

      • removeGatherer

        public boolean removeGatherer(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for removing a worker from the IResourceManager that he is currently assigned to. This includes both the MineralPatchManager and the RefineryManager.
        Parameters:
        entry - the worker that is going to be removed from his assigned IResourceManager.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was successfully removed from the IResourceManager, false if he was either not assigned to one or the removal of him failed.

      • addRefinery

        public void addRefinery(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Function for adding an additional refinery to the RefineryManager. Mainly used when new ones are being constructed.
        Parameters:
        unit - the refinery that the RefineryManager is now going to manage.

      • removeRefinery

        public void removeRefinery(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Function for removing a refinery from the RefineryManager. Mainly used when existing ones are being destroyed.
        Parameters:
        unit - the refinery that is going to be removed from the RefineryManager.

      • isAssignedGatheringMinerals

        public boolean isAssignedGatheringMinerals(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for testing if a ResourceManagerEntry is assigned to a MineralPatchManager.
        Parameters:
        entry - the worker that is going to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the worker is assigned to a MineralPatchManager, false if not.

      • isAssignedGatheringGas

        public boolean isAssignedGatheringGas(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for testing if a ResourceManagerEntry is assigned to a RefineryManager.
        Parameters:
        entry - the worker that is going to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the worker is assigned to a RefineryManager, false if not.

      • isAssignedGathering

        public boolean isAssignedGathering(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for testing if a ResourceManagerEntry is assigned to either a MineralPatchManager OR a RefineryManager.
        Parameters:
        entry - the worker that is going to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the worker is assigned to either a MineralPatchManager OR a RefineryManager.

      • findManager

        private IResourceManager findManager(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for finding the IResourceManager that contains the provided ResourceManagerEntry as a assigned worker.
        Parameters:
        entry - the worker which will be looked for in the different IResourceManagers.
        Returns:
        the IResourceManager that contains the worker / has the worker assigned or null, if none of the managers contains the ResourceManagerEntry.

      • getGatheringSource

        public bwapi.Unit getGatheringSource(ResourceManagerEntry entry)
        Function for retrieving the gathering source of the ResourceManagerEntry that it was assigned to internally. This includes BOTH the mineral spots as well as existing refineries since both are Unit types.
        Parameters:
        entry - the worker whose gathering source is going to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the gathering source the ResourceManagerEntry was assigned to internally.

      • getInformationStorage

        public InformationStorage getInformationStorage()
